price: Adabbichis isaan qabate, Kana keessa mallattootu jira. Irra hedduun isaanii Mu’uminoota hin taane.
arabic: فَأَخَذَهُمُ ٱلۡعَذَابُۚ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَةٗۖ وَمَا كَانَ أَكۡثَرُهُم مُّؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: fa-akhadhahumu al-ʿadhābu inna fī dhālika laāyatan wamā kāna aktharuhum mu'minīna
